column3:
Lulu is a little dog.  She likes to play with her toys.  She really likes her little lamb.
ewlineShe likes when Lauren throws her lamb.  Lulu likes to chases the lamb.  Lulu doesn't like
ewlineto bring the lamb back to Lauren.  Lauren gets mad. 
ewline
ewlineLulu likes to bark.  She barks at the children outside.  She barks when the mailman comes
ewlineto the door.  Lulu barks at everything.  Lulu barks all the time.  Daddy gets mad.
ewline
ewlineLulu likes to eat.  She likes her dog food.  Her dog food has a picture of dog that looks
ewlinelike her on the bag. Lulu likes her food, but she likes the cat's food better.  The cat
ewlinegets mad.
ewline
ewlineLulu likes to drink water.  Her favorite water bowl is in her cage.  Lulu likes that water
ewlinebowl because it's the right height.  Lulu likes her water bowl, but she likes Heather's
ewlineglass of water better.  Heather gets mad.
ewline
ewlineLulu likes her bed.  She goes there to rest.  She likes to sleep on the blanket there.
ewlineHer favorite blanket is from Grandma.  Lulu likes Grandma's blanket, but she likes Alan's
ewlinebetter.  Alan gets mad.
ewline
ewlineLulu curls up on the blanket on the couch.  Lauren gives Lulu her lamb to sleep with.
ewlineDaddy pets Lulu.  The cat licks Lulu.  Heather thinks Lulu looks sweet.  Alan lets Lulu
ewlineuse his blanket.  No one gets mad at Lulu.
column4: one: Where is Lulu's favorite water bowl?
column5: her favorite water bowl is the fish bowl
column6: her favorite water bowl is on the kitchen floor
column7: her favorite water bowl is in her cage
column8: her favorite water bowl is the cat's water bowl
column9: multiple: Why does Daddy get mad?
column10: Lulu never brings her lamb to him when they play fetch
column11: Lulu drinks from Daddy's water glass
column13: Lulu barks at everything and she barks all the time
column14: multiple: What do Lauren and Alan give to Lulu to sleep with?
column15: Lauren gives Lulu her doll and Alan gives Lulu his scarf
column16: Lauren gives her a toy cat and Alan gives her Grandma's blanket
column17: Lauren gives her the lamb and Alan gives her his blanket
column18: Lauren gives Lulu her blanket and Alan gives her the lamb
column19: one: What toy does Lulu like to play with?
